website_summaries.verdict: High-efficiency cyclone technology that has led to many imitators.
pros: Self-adjusting head switches from hard floors to carpet automatically
Ball makes it very easy to steer
HEPA filtration traps allergens and bacteria
cons: Some are critical of performance on thick carpets

website_summaries.verdict: It has a lower price than some Dyson vacs and is easy to maneuver with good suction, but the trade-off for the price is some quality and practicality issues.
pros: Ball technology makes it easy to maneuver over most carpet and hardwood flooring
cons: Feels a bit unstable when locked in the upright position
Some of the plastic components feel flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in Dyson
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum, but after using it for 13 months, the hose came apart and the vacuum lost suction. I called Dyson and was told I would have to purchase a new hose. So much for their five year warranty. This is my third Dyson vacuum and I have never had a problem with any of them until now. I'm very disappointed that this hose wasn't covered under the warranty. With what I have paid for these vacuums and Dyson's warranty claims, I expected better. 😠
customer_reviews.author: Sue Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!  Sucks! Or should I say doesn’t suck!
customer_reviews.text: Awful suction. I’ve spent more time trying to figure out if it’s clogged and/or trouble shooting it than being able to vacuum my floors. It gets nothing from edges and barely sucks anything at all. It blows stuff around on hardwood rather than suck it up! Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Pep

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum cleans just fine, but it's the most awkward piece of equipment ...
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum cleans just fine, but it's the most awkward piece of equipment I've ever worked with. It does not move easily, and once it's in the "leaning" position, you have to "crack" it in order to get it to stand up straight. The very worst design problem is that the red "on-off" button is an inch away from the red "dump cannister" button! So if you're at all distracted--by a phone call, child, whatever--and you go to turn it off, there's a decent chance you'll hit the "dump" button instead.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Mizejewski

customer_reviews.title: Cleans like it should, but the darned thing squeaks - so it is very annoying to use
customer_reviews.text: Big Dyson fans - used our other one for 10 years. Figured that a new one could better handle the shedding of our 4-legged large fur ball. Loved using it for a few weeks, then the thing began squealing. That is so annoying that I now hate using it. I hope to find some way to notify Dyson and ask them to fix the problem. To bad that I need to wear ear plugs to drown out the screeching sound.
customer_reviews.author: SewSparkle

customer_reviews.title: Very Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: We had two older Dysons which we liked very much. The recent purchase seemed like cheap plastic, was top heavy (fell over), didn’t like the ball arrangement. The entire Dyson was no comparison in quality to the older models. We returned the vacuum, looking for better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Worked great... for 8 months. Then it lost suction.
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy this. It's a great vacuum until the day it isn't a vacuum anymore. Dyson customer service is not easy to navigate, and you cant exactly walk into an amazon retailer and return this thing. Going to try hunting down answers/help from amazon a bit longer before I cut my loses, but i'll soon be walking into a Costco to buy what they've got (not a dyson).
customer_reviews.author: CatLady4LIFE

customer_reviews.title: Broken beyond repair at 13 months
customer_reviews.text: I want to preface this review to note that I never write negative reviews. However, I am so disappointed in the lifespan of this Dyson! My husband bought this vacuum while I was on hospital bedrest with our third baby. After experiencing several technical issues that we were able to fix, the vacuum broke beyond repair at 13 months old. We used it 2x a week in a medium size home and emptied often. After spending $400 on this vacuum, I expected it to work much longer. Based on our experiences with this vacuum, I would recommend going another route if you're on the edge with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Lischka

customer_reviews.title: powerful suction
customer_reviews.text: this vacuum has the most suction of any vacuum i have every used and i have the dyson animal cordless and a i robot and had a electrolux canister, seriously they can not even compare to the power of this vacuum ... HOWEVER this dyson is heavy and hard to push,if you have back issues or you are elderly this is NOT the vacuum for you..this is not a deal breaker for me as i LOVE everything else about this vacuum ..the waste bin is easy to dump, it is bagless and my hardwood floors and carpets look like new, this is why i gave this product 5 stars because for me it is a 5 star vacuum
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Well-made, sturdy, easy to assemble. I'm elderly and so not that strong, but I find it easy to maneuver and the suction is fine on most of my carpets. However, in the hallway I have this 'Stainmaster' where liquid spills sort of bead up rather than sinking in, and it is practically impossible to push forward on it. I have to turn off the vacuum before pushing it forward, then drag it towards me with the suction on. This kind of carpet is deservedly popular, and so this may explain some of the conflicting reviews. Wish it had adjustable suction. Other than that, though, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Don't order from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Have had this less than a year. Two clean adults, we rarely need to vacuum. The canister ensemble is broken and looks like it was before we even bought it. Canister flew open, and dirt went everywhere. Dyson won't fix the problem, because it's through Amazon
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Only worked properly a very short while.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this vacuum for two months. The Amazon warranty expired after one month. This vacuum cleaner was great at first. It is no longer working properly both as a carpet vacuum and as a hardwood floor vacuum. The hose attachment no longer draws. Disappointed we may have to have a service charge to have it fixed .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Motor Failed Within 1 Year - No Warranty
customer_reviews.text: The motor failed for the brush within 1 year of use. The advertised warranty was not valid per Dyson customer service because it was from an "unauthorized seller". The vacuum was not worth repairing and their customer service was useless. While this vacuum was great while it worked, it was ultimately a waste of money. If you buy this vacuum, you should only buy it directly from Dyson so it can be repaired when it breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superior Vacuum Performance
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is clearly superior to the other vacuums I've had in the past. It restored heavy traffic sections of carpet that I thought were beyond recovery. Doesn't pass across small throw rugs well... tends to want to gather them up when the beater bar is activated. The benefits out weigh this minor issue.
customer_reviews.author: G. Toft

customer_reviews.title: it is the best I have had so far
customer_reviews.text: I would this vacuum; it is the best I have had so far. I'm not sure if this is specific to this particular model or my item, but the handle seems a bit "loose". Every time I need to make a hard turn, I feel like the neck is about to snap, but soon realize that's just how it feels versus it actually ever breaking. I suspect that the newer models have resolved this issue, but as I cannot afford them, I bought this one and it is the best vacuum I have ever owned. No doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Martin M. Elissetche

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. I had always heard the hype about ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I had always heard the hype about Dyson and I now see why. We keep a fairly clean house and just had the carpets professionally cleaned a few months ago. Our first pass with the Dyson on approximately 300 square feet picked up an entire canister of debris (mostly fine particles) that were apparently unseen and trapped deep in the carpets. I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: **THIS VACUUM SUCKS..
customer_reviews.text: **THIS VACUUM SUCKS......UP EVERYTHING!!** Think: running perpendicular to the wall where tightly tucked into the space between the wall and carpet is completely lined with make-your-own-jewelry beads, Cheerios and cat litter. No need to pull out the wand/attachment, this bad boy has your back! OOPS! "Forget" to pick up that pile of dirty laundry so you're just vacuuming around it and this guy SUCKS UP a towel?! NO PROBLEM: Simply detach the cover & remove whatever's wrapped around the roller brush! BONUS POINTS: Filter-freedom - comes with TWO low maintenance, HIGH performance filters (e.g., rinse & air out every 90 days) Get a Dyson = Get Done! AWESOME!
customer_reviews.author: ~Eclectic Outlook~

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING -- Dyson is the best!
customer_reviews.text: We had the Dyson Animal for 10+ years and it finally gave out on us. We first bought a less expensive vacuum (Bissell) and returned it the day it showed up. We used it once and thought, this is what you get for $170? Nevermind! We want the Dyson for $299! So, we invested and are SO HAPPY! This vacuum is amazing, as was the first Dyson we had. There simply is no better vacuum on the market. It is so worth the money...we won't buy any other brand again! Hopefully Dyson is around in another 10 years! :-)
customer_reviews.author: RebeccaMc

customer_reviews.title: The best vacuum period!
customer_reviews.text: The best vacuum that we have ever owned. Real powerful suction. Handles curves and corners using the ball technology. It is very easy to push and the handle and extension wand can get to some very high places. It is worth it, people who own retail "pet hair" vacuums that we have shown our vacuum to are jealous.
customer_reviews.author: Chris L McClish - CoachCMC

customer_reviews.title: While this item does a good job of vacuuming
customer_reviews.text: While this item does a good job of vacuuming, the design leaves a great deal to be desired. I certainly expected more for the price. Emptying the canister is messy and the automatic lever to do the emptying broke the first time I used it. Not an item I'd recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: LLB

customer_reviews.title: Overall great, but the hose really sucks...
customer_reviews.text: Now that I've had this vacuum for a while, I've been able to figure out what I like and dislike about it. Overall, it's a really good vacuum. I don't think I'd recommend it though. Pros: Bagless, washable filters, easy to maneuver, lightweight, sturdy & decent attachments/accessories. Cons: The hose sucks (no pun intended). In theory, the hose is great; In practice, it's almost impossible to extend more than a couple of feet without the vacuum following you around. Attachments can be expensive. My favorite attachment is the. I really feel like the biggest missing feature is locking wheels, or something to keep it in place when you extend the hose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Vacuum I've Owned
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum. It really sucks! For a vacuum, that's a good thing. Easy to empty canister. Simple and quick access to attachments. Easy to clean filter. Super super maneuverability and ease in use. No regrets on shelling out twice the money for a superior product. Great price on amazon, beat out every other seller by $100. Worth it. Carpet feels noticeably fluffier after use. Not too heavy. Simple and efficient. Just don't buy it for your wife for a birthday present... stick to spa days or jewelry for that. It's been three months of heavy use on lots of carpet and it works like it did right outta the box.
customer_reviews.author: MommaMel

customer_reviews.title: 5 years now and good performance has given my family assurance that we are ...
customer_reviews.text: Owner of the product over 1.5 years now and good performance has given my family assurance that we are keeping the house clean. However, I just found out that the plastic core of pre filter has melted, it is partially covering the filter. I am concerned that if this has any affect to its performance or on capability of filter. I guess I will be replacing this at own cost but it is worrisome because 1) apparently others are experiencing this as well and 2) it can be a safety issue.
customer_reviews.author: YYS

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed. They are victim of great engineering and poor ...
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. They are victim of great engineering and poor design. The vacuum has unbelievable suction. Unfortunately It forms a seal on the carpet which makes lt impossible to move. If only there were a way to adjust the height this would be an incredible machine. Dumb design. Looks like it’s getting returned.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A. Novak

customer_reviews.title: Wide Head and Efficient Suction
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a 2 year old upright Shark with this Dyson, and I could not believe how much "stuff" that came out of the carpets when I ran over the floors again with the Dyson. Another plus is that the head is wider, which means the job gets done quicker. Super happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Gracie

customer_reviews.title: Does not work on all flooring as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Does not work well on area carpets if they are slightly lightweight. Was surprised about this. This was a Christmas gift for my son and daughter-in-law and I was embarrassed that they have had problems with this vacuum. I told them to return it but they like it overall. It just doesn't work on one of their area rugs.
customer_reviews.author: jhk

customer_reviews.title: BROKE
customer_reviews.text: I had a Dyson for 15 years, I finally replaced it and this one broke after maybe 5-6 vacuum sessions. I was using the attachment and the base of it must have broke off, now i cannot put the hose back into place. I can't believe it, I thought Dyson made decent products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the power of this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum sucks!! No, I mean, it's super powerful! I really enjoy vacuuming with this dyson. It's worth the money. Turns so nicely, especially compared to my 8 year old Hoover that I replaced with this one. The ONLY downside of this vacuum is that the cord is not retractable. For the price I feel like that should be a given. But I guess the design doesn't allow for it. Anyway, it's not a big deal...I still recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: NIB

customer_reviews.title: It is very easy to use and seamlessly transitions from hardwood floor to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Dyson and I'm very impressed. It is very easy to use and seamlessly transitions from hardwood floor to carpet to tiles in the bathroom. It is very easy to maneuver around furniture and the long reach of the handle makes cleaning the stairs and top of the windows very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Swami

customer_reviews.title: I'm totally amazed at its efficiency at being able to switch from ...
customer_reviews.text: The Dyson is exceptional at pulling old lingering crud out of the carpeting in my townhome as well as out of wool area rugs that I have and a braided oval rug in the dining room. I'm totally amazed at its efficiency at being able to switch from the rugs to the hardwood floors. I can honestly say that I hope this vacuum never wears out because I don't ever want to replace it!!! And the price point couldn't have been better!
customer_reviews.author: MaryJane Bolin

customer_reviews.title: Tried and true
customer_reviews.text: We had a dyson for 12 years before my husband forced a piece down and broke it. After taping it together for years it finally broke in another spot that was unrepairable with tape. We decided to just bite the bullet and get a new one. We love this one. Easy to clean, easy to use. Would recommend. I'd probably buy the next model higher next time, in 15 years.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Ok, not too great, sometimes annoying.
customer_reviews.text: Not too great, can be fairly annoying. This vacuum replaced my older Dyson, which I liked, but it lost suction. It does a decent job cleaning my Berber carpet and hardwood floors. But it is annoying to use. The construction feels cheap, like it could break when steering it. The electric cord keeps getting caught between the stabilizer and the ball-thingy. The handle frequently fails to secure properly in the upright position, causing it to crash down on the floor. The accessory hose is tricky to get seated in the handle. The brush tool has less bristles compared to my 2008 Dyson. Still, it does a decent job cleaning the carpets.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE! scratches hardwood floors
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand why dyson doesn't put rubber wheels on their expensive products. I had to wrap duct tape around the wheels to stop it scratching my floors. I've had this vacuum for 4 years and it just gave up the ghost with a burning smell.
customer_reviews.author: MN

customer_reviews.title: A true winner
customer_reviews.text: I am a senior citizen and this is easy to maneuver, not too heavy, the suction is great. Directions for assembly need some work. I used some common sense and handled that section. There are several red buttons so please put an on/off symbol on the on/off button. Overall I am thrilled with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn C.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Believe all the pictures people have posted about how much stuff this vacuum picks up. I debated long and hard about investing $300 into a vacuum but so far it's been worth it. I've used this several times already carpet/hardwood/tile/car and it knocks it out of the park. The attachments are a bit lack luster, and the extension hose as amazingly long as it is... is still a bit awkward and clunky to work with. The weight of the product wasn't a concern for me but it is heavy in all the right areas and glides across the carpet. It's not as noisy as I thought it would be. Especially given the power this thing has.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for homes with pets and hard floors/carpet!
customer_reviews.text: We have a cat that sheds like there is no tomorrow and we have a puppy! This thing was an awesome investment. We have hard floors and carpet, meaning you can see the white cat hair on the hard floors and then it gets imbedded into the carpet. Although it is a bit heavy, it definitely gets the job done quickly and easily!
customer_reviews.author: Madeline P.

customer_reviews.title: Hose needs quality improvement
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this vacuum for just a little over a year and a half and the hose broke, which I’m seeing is common with the other reviews. I also have a Kirby which I use regularly also for about 15 years... never had to replace any hose. Not too happy about having to pay to replace it and not covered under warranty. Not the quality i expected from a $300 vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent performance. My only complaint is that the handle ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent performance. My only complaint is that the handle for maneuvering the vacuum flexes while turning and feels a bit cheap. My older Dyson felt more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as they used to be
customer_reviews.text: I have a dyson that I purchased about 9 years ago that I love. I purchased this one because I loved the other one so much. This one was very disappointing. I don't care for the ball, which that is the only way to get a dyson, so I thought I would try, the vacuum doesn't stand up very well, when you roll it it snaps into place like when you vacuum, seems to be so much more cheaply made than my other one. I purchased this one because I wanted to have one when my other dyson quit working & the price seemed right, not too happy with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Great suction
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Dyson - last one, an Animal, lasted 6+ years. I debated between this one and the Animal - chose this one because it had better suction. The 'pro' in comparison to the old Animal: lighter, improved suction, good mobility due to the ball, and does a better job on stairs. The 'con' compared to the old Animal, the cord is shorter than the old one, the tools don't fit on the vacuum, and the parts don't seem as 'heavy' duty as my old Animal. Overall - it works well (have had for about a month and I vacuum about twice week).
customer_reviews.author: TM195

customer_reviews.title: Wifey was tired of the old canister bad so we got a second mortgage and bought a ...
customer_reviews.text: Wifey was tired of the old canister bad so we got a second mortgage and bought a Dyson....just kidding. Vacuum works great, it has great suction as advertised but maybe a little too much at times. On thicker carpets it tends to bog and the brush roller stalls out. I get the whole "auto floor" thingy but it needs a user controlled height adjustment to prevent this. Other than that, it is a very nimble unit on hardwoods. Overall, very satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: Another nice Dyson.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well on most surfaces. I have one large rug that doesn't tolerate the beater brushes on this Dyson, though my old Dyson Animal model cleaned that same rug very well. Go figure. I read some reviews stating that this model tends to fall over when not in use. Mine locks in place nicely in the upright position, so all is well here. I think the Dysons are too pricey for the quality of their construction, but they do their job well, most of the time. I wait for sales before I buy.
customer_reviews.author: Gotta Tellya

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money - you will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS VACUUM! Excellent for pets, allergies, multi-floor types, easy to use and maneuver. The suction in the attachment works great for dusting, as well as dusty clean up jobs. I did a lot of research before buying this vacuum and I am not disappointed - it lives up to its reputation as the strongest vacuum. Bonus: I bought mine 'used' from Amazon: the vacuum looked completely new when it arrived and I saved!
customer_reviews.author: Lady J, Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Dyson vacuum
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this vacuum to replace a previous Dyson that we had for years. The replacement is very wobbly I believe the construction is nowhere near what it used to be. The vacuum cleaner when you go to latch it in the upright position it has a tendency to fall and again not as good as the old one as far as Construction. On a positive note. The suction is twice as strong. We are now unable to vacuum throw rugs it tries to eat them.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry F

customer_reviews.title: I love Dyson
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is amazing. I bought it to replace my animal Dyson that finally started pooping out on me after seven years. I forgot just how much suction these had when they're working right. Absolutely my favorite vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Stands up to a college student. The guys really needed it. The mechanical engineer in the group was fascinated, immediately, on the sound of a paper clip. Absolutely love the product. The boys actually use it. WoW, was it needed!! Works on tile and carpeted floors. Navigates several bar stools with ease. Strongly recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael F. Fargo

customer_reviews.title: Hard working machiine!!
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic. It really does pick up a massive amount of debris on the carpet. With 3 dogs & 4 cats, the carpet needs to be clean and this Dyson does the job. The canister is near filled everytime I clean the main floor of the house. It's handy with a pull out wand. I bought this on a whim after reading reviews and am so glad that I did.
customer_reviews.author: J. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: very powerful
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Dyson. The power on this machine is unbelievable. I always used my other machine on throw rugs but I can't with this one. The suction is too powerful. The ball turning is different than my old one but it's just something I have to get used to. It's also lighter and smaller and I like that. I guess I just have to get used to the power. I vacuumed my old bedroom carpet and I swear it looked new and didn't flatten out for days. Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: Dyson is nomber one in cleaning cat hairs.
customer_reviews.text: Have a burgundy colored rug. Areas where my cat likes to lay turn a brownish color. My 2 previous vacumes never quite did the job of making the burgundy color sharp like it was when I moved into this condo. I get my carpets twice as clean, with half the effort. Recommend it to any pet owners.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L. Patt

customer_reviews.title: The red part broke the second week we had this vacuum cleaner but Dyson has great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this a 5 star but the wand is a bit clumsy to use. The red part broke the second week we had this vacuum cleaner but Dyson has great customer service. I called them and they sent me a free replacement. Over all it cleans floors and rugs very well.
customer_reviews.author: nee

customer_reviews.title: TOO HEAVY
customer_reviews.text: VERY heavy and does not lie down flat to get under things. They are way cheaper at walmart. I feel like I got ripped off here. Sure it vacuums well, but so did my Oreck and it was cheaper, lighter and would lie flat. I'm going back to Oreck
customer_reviews.author: T. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I love my new dyson vacuum cleaner. I had a shark before I had this one and the suction was no were close to this machine. It's easy to carry around and so easy to use. I love how the hose is not crazy difficult to set up to use. You simple just pull it out there's not hooking anything up. And the hose is very long to where you can reach your ceiling. This machine has by far passed up my expectations for a vacuum cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Katie fontenot

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Dyson we have owned. The first one lasted 9 years. This one has even better cleaning technology than the old one which was already great. We have tile, hardwood floors and rugs and it is very good on all surfaces. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Dyson good but heavy with cord
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted a Dyson. Read the review that talked of its power. I defiantly wanted power. Been going thru a chargeable floor vac a year with diminishing power. Great Black Friday price. Should have researched a little more to see it is heavy and had a cord. Husband won't use it- hates the cord. More work for me. It is little more work but it does work great which we need with 2 dogs and grandkids
customer_reviews.author: Cat C

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Just tried this product for the first time. I had never owned a Dyson, but know a few people that have had the same one for years and raved about the quality. Thought it would be a good investment, as my Bissel that was 2 years old just died on me. This was such a great purchase and I found it for $100 less on here than at Target. The suction was incredible and my carpet has never looked so good. Easy to assemble and handle. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: OHTeach81

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: There’s no doubt these are the best out there hands down. This one is reasonable in price for what you get. Suction is second to none.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding on Carpets
customer_reviews.text: This is outstanding on carpets! It absolutely sucks hard and pulls everything out of the carpet. It’s fairly heavy to push and pull, but it turns on a dime. I don’t like the hose at all! You have to pull the handle/rod out to use the hose and because it recoils, I feel like I’m constantly playing tug-of-war with it. The power cord is long, but there is no automatic cord retraction so you have to manually wrap it.
customer_reviews.author: Smart Poptart

customer_reviews.title: Good suction and mobility
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is light weight and has good mobility around turns. The suction coming out of the box is very good. I could tell with the first use it was picking up much more dirt than my old vacuum. So far well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Harris

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic vacuum. We have owned several Bissell products
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic vacuum. We have owned several Bissell products, which we have always been happy with, but this vacuum blows them away. It is expensive but worth it. We have two dogs that SHED like crazy, and if you are a pet owner, buying this with the Dyson tangle free turbine tool is a no-brainer. Our couches have been infinitely more clear of dog hair since this purchase. Excellent suction. Does go on sale from time to time, we were able to purchase for $225. Only drawback is there is no way to detach the canister for stairs, but the detachable hose does have a fairly long reach. Would buy again without a doubt.
customer_reviews.author: zig53

customer_reviews.title: But this vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to recieve this. Packaged well, price was great and seller had some fast shipping! The vacuum works perfectly, had no problems! Cleaned my carpets and my hardwood floors, and I had been out of a vacuum for nearly a week
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Love the dyson vacuums!
customer_reviews.text: Great dyson we have owned 2 of these units and love them! Great value and warranty
customer_reviews.author: Reece M

customer_reviews.title: Better than my Kirby vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This vacuum gets my floors looking clean and more importantly I can feel it is clean. As I dump the the collection chamber it's so great to see all the dirt, dust, hair, etc come out and into garbage!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum power and moves with grace
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum has really good strength. Maneuvers great as well. Only part I don't like is the way it switches from standing to operating. It just drops when you place downward pressure. I don't see a foot release. Makes an ugly clack sound and doesn't look like that mechanism can last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Jaded_Ronin

customer_reviews.title: What you plan to use it for!
customer_reviews.text: I like this vacuum very much! Lightweight and smooth to use. Has very strong suction power.
customer_reviews.author: Sir N8

customer_reviews.title: I miss my old dyson but this one has good suction and adjusts well from carpet to hard floors
customer_reviews.text: I miss my old dyson but this one has good suction and adjusts well from carpet to hard floors. I don't like how you have to pull the handle back, I feel as if I am going to break it every time. Using the tools also isn't as easy as the other model and the chord is too short. Its a dyson so it picks up well but it is just harder to use than my last one. :(
customer_reviews.author: Heather B. Moulton

customer_reviews.title: It does have great suction but wonder how it will hold up over ...
customer_reviews.text: A Dyson Ball for $225? Have never seen that price again... I should have bought 2. It does have great suction but wonder how it will hold up over time due to all the plastic used in its construction? Came with a 5 year warranty though. The floor cleaning head tends to snap loose from the 'catch' when carrying it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian F.

customer_reviews.title: Its like a well built functional lego system
customer_reviews.text: Had one of my own, friend kept borrowing mine. Some other friends and I split it for her Birthday. So excited for her. Mine has been a dream. Its like a well built functional lego system. If something goes awry, it is easy to obtain the parts and fix it yourself. I gladly have owned mine for 5yrs without incident and it works as well as it did out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Cassette Fanatic

customer_reviews.title: Best place for this non-robust vacuum is the garbage
customer_reviews.text: Best place for this non-robust vacuum is the garbage. Threw it away today due to loss of suction, and failure of brush disengage button. Not a bad vacuum if you can afford to replace it every couple of years.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan D Cox

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Hate this vacuum!! I love dyson but not the ball. Cheap and flimsy not like the regular upright I have had for 10 years. Thing always wants to fall over when in the upright position and the hose is a real pain to put back to use as an upright.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it
customer_reviews.text: We have always bought a mid-range $150 vacuum and cycled through them about once every two years. This vacuum is unreal. The amount of dirt it pulled out of our carpets during its first use was disgusting. To see what are old hoover was leaving behind really put things into prespective. I really didn't buy into the Dyson hype, but picked this up on sale for under $300 and would gladly pay double now that I know what I was missing.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised
customer_reviews.text: Works as promised. If I had to buy it again, I would do the cordless one.
customer_reviews.author: C Erd

customer_reviews.title: Just plain works
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome vacuum! I am seriously impressed at how it takes cat hair out of the carpet, and its exceptionally easy to clean. It is very maneuverable, and I wish I hadn't blown 90-bucks on an everyday upright vacuum a couple of years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Harman

customer_reviews.title: Love this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum. I don't know if they still make it (got mine about 2 years ago) but it's a real sucker. We use it for carpeted and hardwood floors, stairs, upholstery, etc. and it does a great job of getting all the dirt and dust and hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Because we built a second home, this is our second Dyson purchase. Obviously we were pleased with the first. Despite our appreciation for the first, we were truly surprised by how much better this model is. The vacuum is great at searching out all kinds of dirt, sand, pet hair and dust... enough so that we are considering purchase of another for our first home.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Less expensive but definitely cheaper quality. I still prefer my 8 year old dyson over this model. I have only had it a few months and already delegated it to being the back up vacuum. I will just keep fixing my old one.
customer_reviews.author: uwilglo

customer_reviews.title: Very efficient.
customer_reviews.text: My adult children have a Dyson and both raved about it. When ours died there was no reason to not try one.Love it! I am no longer physically tired after vacuuming by repeatedly going back and forth to get the level of clean I want. Why did I wait so long to throw that old one out? Also so very easy to empty canister. Great on our 20 carpeted steps. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Judie Williams

customer_reviews.title: Love the dyson vacuum this is my second one in ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the dyson vacuum this is my second one in 10 years. My first dyson vacuum received 5 stars it is perfect and still running and working. For this vacuum I gave 4 only because it's not as light as my first vacuum. This one I need to push harder but it does vacuum very good.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Could Be Better
customer_reviews.text: This is a step up from my old store brand vacuum, but I'm surprised Dyson would put their name on this for a few reasons: 1. It's heavy 2. The power button is strangely placed 3. It's loud On the plus side, it does clean the dirt well from my carpet.
customer_reviews.author: scary_clowns

customer_reviews.title: Dyson was made better years ago!
customer_reviews.text: The suction is great. It’s hard to move around if you are using the hose with floor attachment. The whole canister will release if you do not move it carefully. I have to say the one I had ten years ago was ten times better!! I cannot tell my husband I don’t love this purchase because he did not want me to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I just used mine for the first time and I am horrified to see what was in my rug! Obviously my old one wasn't up to the job but this Dyson sure is. Honestly, when I first assembled it my first reaction was that it was kind of flimsy looking so I was pleasantly surprised by the performance. Definitely lives up to it's reputation.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: DEEP CLEANING MY DIRTY RUG
customer_reviews.text: Do not pay attention to the NEGATIVE REVIEWS. This vacuum sucks everything up like no other vacuum. It also has a 5 year warranty. If something goes wrong with it Dyson Customer Service will help you to fix by phone. If that does not work Dyson will pay for the boxing and shipping of the vacuum to their Head Quarters. DYSON COVERS LABOR AND PARTS FOR FIVE YEARS.My previous vacuum just pressed my German Shepherd hair and dust into the big living room rug. now this Dyson is DEEP CLEANING THAT RUG. It is unbelievable the amount of dust that comes out of that rug.THE DUST IS GETTING LESS AND LESS AFTER ABOUT 4 VACUUMING.
customer_reviews.author: Rab B.

customer_reviews.title: ... this vacuum for a few months and it's been great. We have two cats
customer_reviews.text: We've had this vacuum for a few months and it's been great. We have two cats, so we use it often. I love how easy it is to turn the brushes on and off. I just wish it had more on-board tools.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Farrugia

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this vacuum if you need to clean carpet
customer_reviews.text: If you have any carpet to clean, do not buy this vacuum! It is impossible to push along the carpet, the suction is too strong!!
customer_reviews.author: Scuvell

customer_reviews.title: Decent vacuum.  Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Overall a decent vacuum. Great suction. Questionable designs per other’s comments. On/off button stopped working but no hassle shipping for repair by Dyson.
customer_reviews.author: Jun

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum and great investment.
customer_reviews.text: Love itttttttt! Light weight, easy to assemble, and easy to use. Very powerful and does a great job effortlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Yaz

customer_reviews.title: Great machine that really does a great job! Just not crazy about the change in the wand.
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint so far is that the wand is not as user friendly as the previous Dyson I owned.Suction is wonderful and I like the ease of turning off the beater head for hard surface floors. I hope the wand holds up as it is all plastic and no metal at all.
customer_reviews.author: green horse pastures

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't seem as tough as my old version Dyson, but does seem to work well.
customer_reviews.author: bbbj

customer_reviews.title: But man does it suck.
customer_reviews.text: When I opened it I was not impressed with the quality of construction the first time I put my hands on Dyson. But man does it suck.
customer_reviews.author: A guy

customer_reviews.title: awsome dyson
customer_reviews.text: can't beat a dyson.sucks the tin man through a key hole
customer_reviews.author: vickie williams

customer_reviews.title: ... weighs an absolute ton and the plastic materials feel like they will not last long (although in fairness
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum weighs an absolute ton and the plastic materials feel like they will not last long (although in fairness, nothing has broken yet after about 8 months of use). That said, it is a hell of a vacuum as far as suction power, and it works very well. On area rugs, it works too well...it will suck the rug right off the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Pfeffer

customer_reviews.title: suction is awesome! We are a clean house or so I ...
customer_reviews.text: Our Dyson was delivered today. Instructions are a tad bit blurry for assembly; suction is awesome! We are a clean house or so I thought. This vacumn showed us we weren't . Just a couple passes over area rugs and hard wood floor area shows different. And we were using a Dyson before. Already love the new model. Pricey; worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper Gal

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: If you are a current Dyson vacuum owner, this vacuum works as expected. If you are thinking of upgrading to a Dyson, then you will be happy with this vacuum. If it had a light, I would have given it 5 stars. I don't vacuum in the dark, but LED lights are cool.
customer_reviews.author: The Rich Pune

customer_reviews.title: She said it's easy to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my 60 year old mother. She absolutely loves this vacuum. She said it's easy to maneuver, light weight, and picks up everything including cat hair.
customer_reviews.author: Teach

customer_reviews.title: It's not clean unless it's dyson clean
customer_reviews.text: Best Vacuum ever. We decided to go with the corded because in order to clean the whole house the cordless ones don't last long enough. This dyson REALLY performs. Picks up EVERYTHING. It's amazing. I would highly recommend it. Your house isn't clean unless you use a dyson.
customer_reviews.author: Charmaine Keck

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our old Dyson vacuum was at the end of it's life and we were in the need to purchase a new vacuum. This vacuum works wonders! It is much heavier than the smaller Dyson that we previously owned.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hwang

customer_reviews.title: Works well on carpet and wood floors
customer_reviews.text: Works better than most vacumes. The first one's roller didn't work though they replaced it and it works well on carpets and on wood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Choose a Dyson!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this during Black Friday for only $200 which is a steal for a Dyson. With two cats, most vacuums get hair stuck in the rollers but this thing just keeps sucking. It also has the amazing ability to get things out from the edges of my carpet without having to pull out the hose and attachments, which is super easy to do with this vacuum anyways. Even better is the ability to transfer to hard floor with the press of a button. I will never by any other vacuum brand. Ever!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Canfield

customer_reviews.title: A 'dream' machine with frightening results in how much dust and grime it can suck out of clean-looking carpets
customer_reviews.text: The Dyson multi-floor edition is the first Dyson we've owned. I will echo the sentiment of other reviewers -- it is frightening just how much dust it pulls out of a carpet well-vacuumed with other older vacuums. The mobility of the ball design is quite handy, and the product feels very modern in its attachment design and assembly. Overall it feels very sleek and somewhat delicate - it isn't a monster you can carelessly bang around worn baseboards and expect it to operate or look as nice as it comes; but it is an excellent choice for its price range.
customer_reviews.author: Sean McElroy

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum suc*s 8-)
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I vacuumed my house with my old vacuum and about a week later my new Dyson showed up. My new Dyson "found" an additional 1-1/2 canisters more dirt. I live alone in a 2000 sf home. I don't make a mess and yet, Dyson was still able to get it cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Deek5

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum cleaner really sucks!
customer_reviews.text: Very effective vacuum cleaner! It picks up cat hair that was missed by my old vacuum. It is a bit heavy to carry around which is the only negative feature I would mention but other than that it a great vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Holly B.

customer_reviews.title: Above average vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Cleaning filter is a pain. Suction could be better. Doesn't manuver on hardwood floors and pick up the dirt well. Seemed to be better built 5 years ago. Seems a little less able to take stress vs. the 1st one I bought 5 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon

product_meta.title: Dyson Ball Multi Floor Upright Vacuum - Corded
product_meta.description: The Dyson Ball Multi Floor vacuum has Radial Root cyclone technology, a self-adjusting cleaner head, Ball technology, whole-machine filtration and comes with a 5-year .
feature_bullets: Whole-machine filtration ensures that allergens are trapped inside the machine, not expelled back into the home.
Self adjusting cleaner head; seals in suction across carpets and hard floors
Wand and hose release in one smooth action, so it’s easy to clean up high and under furniture
Whole machine HEPA filtration traps allergens and bacteria inside the machine
Ball technology; steers easily into difficult places
Hygienic bin emptying; Just push the button to release the dirt

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars1,498 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
